text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Elections (Disclosure of 
Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (Period for Reckoning Election 
Expenses) Order 2024.

title: of Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (No. 7 of 1999) during which election
heading: 2. The period referred to in section 12B of the Local Elections (Disclosure
text_raw:
2. The period referred to in section 12B of the Local Elections (Disclosure 
of Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (No. 7 of 1999) during which election 
expenses at local elections to be held in the year 2024 shall be reckoned for the 
purposes of Part IIIA of the said Act shall commence on the 8th day of April

heading: 3. The period referred to in the said section 12B shall end on the 7th day
text_raw:
3. The period referred to in the said section 12B shall end on the 7th day 

of June 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 April, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th April, 2024.

title: of Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (No. 7 of 1999) during which election
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Order determines the period for the reckoning of election expenses 
incurred by or on behalf of a candidate, designated person, national agent of a 
political party, or third party at the local elections to be held on 7 June 2024, in 
accordance with section 12B of the Local Elections (Disclosure of Donations 
and Expenditure) Act 1999. 

Section 12A of the said Act specifies limits on electoral expenditure which 
may be incurred by a candidate, designated person and national agent during 
the period specified in the Order.
